title: So I just bought the challenger Ahri skin...
body: ...And I forgot to switch to it. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Gets Spirit Guard Udyr.

Forgets to switch to it.
I really wish you could select skin without having to lock in, I hate playing one champ and suddenly remembering that another champ still has default skin selected.
You can, select the champ and then click the tab above the champ select that says 'skins' and you can change the champ skin without locking in
well then, you learn new things every day. my friend only found out about the rune combiner 2 days ago and he's been playing since 2012 XD
tfw forgot to switch off of Exiled Morgana because holy %%%% that classic skin.
